info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 5:19PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Deer Lodge and central Silver Bow Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 516 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Silver Bow, or 9 miles west of Butte, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds of 40 to 45 mph. Gusty crosswinds along Interstate 15 Between Ramsay and Divide may create difficulty driving for high profile vehicles. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Butte, Silver Bow, Walkerville, Nissler, Ramsay, Janney, and Newcomb. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 213 and 225. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
